GalaxyDefenders

Class PoweredBullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • GalaxyDefenders.Bullet
        • GalaxyDefenders.PoweredBullet

  • public class PoweredBullet
extends Bullet
    The PoweredBullet class extends the Bullet class and acts as a power-up that clears the entire column of aliens.
    Version:
    May 25, 2015
    Author:
    Ben Liang, Andy Shen, Pavan Gollapalli, Period: 4, Assignment: GridworldFinal, Sources:

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Moves if it can move. If the bullet goes off the screen, it is removed from the grid. If it makes contact with an alien, the bullet removes the alien, but continues on the same path until it goes off the screen. The bullet moves by a grid every 10th of a second, using the timer.
        Overrides:
        act in class Bullet
